text: Hello everyone! I'm just starting to work in HubSpot, and I have a third party that wants to send me leads via API, and i'm trying to make a private app so i can receive and distribute the leads to my sales team, but i have no idea where to start.

Hi everyone! I wanted to use the webhook functionality. I followed the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/webhooks|guides> and created a developer account. From there I set up a *target url* and some *subscription events* for the entities: *deal, line item*. I added all the necessary *scopes*.

After doing all this I tried to test it by creating a new deal with some line items inside but no webhook event was triggered. I have tested my endpoint using Postman and it works.

Do I need to do any other config before it starts working?

Thank you all!
have you installed the app in the testing account and completed the oAuth flow?
Hi <@UCH1L597V>, No I haven’t done this. How can I do it? Is it as simple as following this <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/oauth2/initiate-oauth-integration|guide>?

Hi everyone!,

I am new to this workspace. I will be very specific and quick with my questions.

I am trying to upload an attachment to the object(Contact specifically) and deal. However, I couldn't find any API for that in the documentation.
I searched through the forum as well, where people suggested uploading files to `file manager` and then creating a `note` and then associate the file with the `note` and finally associate `note` to the `contact` o ``deal``

Can somebody please confirm if there is no direct API to associate or attach file to contact or deal?
Or is it even okay to keep uploading files to file manager to associate them with contact or deal?
Hi everyone. Sorry to bother but I was wondering if anyone had the chance to read my issue
hi <@U04EJ0078H3>, you might try this approach - <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/Form-Submission-API-with-file-upload/m-p/317752>
Hi all! I created the private application for our PBX platform in developer account but I can't make a calls because I can't choose it. Could you help me to setup my account for this opportunity.

Hello all :slightly_smiling_face:

In CRM API V3, can we create an association between objects *with specifying an association label*

Hi All !!! Am experiencing bit strange issue with HUBDB API. Am trying to retrieve last value using the following API <https://api.hubapi.com/cms/v3/hubdb/tables/mxx_holder/rows/draft?sort=-XXX_code&limit=1&properties=xxx_holder_company_code|https://api.hubapi.com/cms/v3/hubdb/tables/mm_broker_agreement_holder/rows/draft?sor[…]XXX_code&limit=1&properties=xxx_holder_company_code>. Although the last value is XXIOC010 but it retrieves XXIOC09
